de.dhbw.sportcontroll.db

Class DataHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhbw.sportcontroll.db.DataHandler

  • public class DataHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This DataHandler provides simple functions to access data in the db and returns only Objects from the dataobject package This is a singelton to make sure only one instance is accessing the DB
    Author:
    daniel

      • SaveSportDiscipline

        public int SaveSportDiscipline(SportDiscipline sd)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException,
                               SQLQueryException
        saves a SportDiscipline-Object in DB. Determines by the ID if its a new entry(id = 0) or an existsing one to update
        Parameters:
        sd - completely filled SportDiscipline Object
        Returns:
        returns the new /current ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
